predictions.text: From 2025-11-18 close to 2025-12-13 close, Apple Inc. (AAPL) adjusted-close total return will underperform Invesco QQQ Trust (QQQ) by at least 2.0 percentage points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance adjusted close data for AAPL and QQQ, compute total return from 2025-11-18 close to 2025-12-13 close. If AAPL_return − QQQ_return ≤ -0.020 (≤ -2.0 percentage points), the prediction is correct.
monitoring_signals: New reports about Apple leadership succession or product roadmap changes
AAPL vs QQQ options-implied skew and realized volatility
Sell-side revisions to AAPL FY26 EPS and gross margin
Headlines on Apple Watch sensor changes or injunction risk
predictions.rationale: Succession overhang and patent liabilities raise near-term idiosyncratic risk for AAPL versus a diversified tech benchmark.

predictions.text: CAISO daily peak system load will reach at least 33,000 MW on at least one day between 2025-11-22 and 2025-12-10 (U.S. dates).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via CAISO Today’s Outlook that the intraday maximum “Demand (MW)” for any date between 2025-11-22 and 2025-12-10 inclusive is ≥ 33,000 MW.
monitoring_signals: Short-term temperature anomalies for CA population centers
Forced outages and renewable availability in CAISO
Holiday load shape effects and electric heating demand
predictions.rationale: Cooler weather and holiday demand can produce a shoulder-season peak exceeding 33 GW.

predictions.text: Cboe VVIX Index will close at or above 105.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Cboe official VVIX daily close; any close ≥ 105.0 on or before 2025-12-15 UTC satisfies the condition.
monitoring_signals: S&P 500 realized volatility and term structure steepening
Large downside skew in SPX options
Macro event risks (data surprises, policy headlines)
predictions.rationale: Elevated tail-hedging demand around year-end and macro catalysts can lift VVIX above 105.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 4.65% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via FRED series DGS2 daily close; any observation ≤ 4.65% on or before 2025-12-15 UTC confirms the prediction.
monitoring_signals: Core PCE/CPI prints and revisions
Fed communications and dot-plot signaling
Eurodollar/SOFR futures and OIS path repricing
predictions.rationale: Softening inflation data and easing term premia can nudge the front end lower.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-15, CISA will add at least 10 CVEs to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog with a Date Added between 2025-12-01 and 2025-12-15 inclusive.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count KEV entries with Date Added from 2025-12-01 to 2025-12-15 (inclusive) on CISA’s official KEV catalog. If count ≥ 10, it is a win.
monitoring_signals: KEV RSS/JSON feed updates
Zero-day disclosures from vendors and CERTs
Observed in-the-wild exploitation reports from threat intel firms
predictions.rationale: Holiday-season patch cycles and active exploitation tend to drive KEV additions in December.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-15, OFAC will announce at least one Russia-related sanctions designation via an official U.S. Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official U.S. Treasury press release dated on/before 2025-12-15 that adds persons/entities related to Russia (e.g., under E.O. 14024) to the SDN list.
monitoring_signals: U.S./EU coordination announcements on Russia sanctions
Battlefield developments in Ukraine
Reports on sanctions evasion networks
predictions.rationale: Regular cadence of Russia-related designations persists amid ongoing conflict and evasion crackdowns.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show a weekly change in U.S. distillate fuel oil stocks of -3.0 million barrels or more (draw) in at least one report published by 2025-12-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: From EIA WPSR, Table 1, the reported “Change from last week” for Distillate fuel oil must be ≤ -3.0 million barrels in any report released on/before 2025-12-15.
monitoring_signals: U.S. refinery utilization and turnaround schedules
Heating degree days (HDDs) in the Northeast and Midwest
Diesel crack spreads and import/export flows
predictions.rationale: Seasonal heating demand and export strength can produce a ≥3 Mb draw in distillates.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, Google, Meta, Microsoft, or Amazon will announce a new transoceanic subsea cable project or a named capacity expansion of an existing system via an official corporate blog or press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official blog post or press release by one of the listed firms dated on/before 2025-12-31 announcing a new subsea cable or a capacity expansion with the cable’s name and specs.
monitoring_signals: Telecom and subsea industry conference announcements
ITU filings or maritime permit notices
Vendor (SubCom/NEC/ASN) press bulletins
predictions.rationale: Hyperscalers regularly expand subsea capacity; extending the horizon raises odds of an announcement.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-16 close to 2025-12-31 close, iShares Semiconductor ETF (SOXX) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 2.5 percentage points on an adjusted-close basis.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance adjusted close, compute total returns for SOXX and SPY from 2025-11-16 close to 2025-12-31 close. If SOXX_return − SPY_return ≤ -0.025, the prediction is correct.
monitoring_signals: Semiconductor book-to-bill and inventory data
Capex and AI GPU lead-time updates
Semis vs S&P earnings revisions breadth
predictions.rationale: Positioning and valuation in AI-levered semis raise pullback risk into year-end.

predictions.text: U.S. Initial Unemployment Insurance Claims (seasonally adjusted) will print at or above 235,000 in at least one weekly report released by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via the Department of Labor’s Weekly Claims news release that any SA initial claims figure on/before 2025-12-31 is ≥ 235,000.
monitoring_signals: Continuing claims trend and insured unemployment rate
Layoff announcements and WARN notices
Temp help employment and online job postings
predictions.rationale: Labor market cooling and seasonal volatility can push claims to 235k+ at least once.

predictions.text: NYMEX Henry Hub front-month natural gas futures (CME: NG) will settle at or below $3.10 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Check CME NG front-month official settlement; any settlement price ≤ $3.10/MMBtu on or before 2025-12-31 UTC qualifies.
monitoring_signals: NOAA 8–14 day temperature outlook for major gas demand regions
Weekly storage balances and production/pipe flows
LNG feedgas and export terminal outages
predictions.rationale: High storage, robust supply, and weather variance can briefly push front-month NG to $3.10 or lower.

predictions.text: The U.S. 5-Year TIPS real yield (FRED: DFII5) will close at or below 1.80% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use FRED DFII5 daily close; any observation ≤ 1.80% on or before 2025-12-31 UTC confirms the prediction.
monitoring_signals: Breakeven inflation moves vs nominals
Risk-off flows and growth data surprises
Treasury supply dynamics and buyback/issuance guidance
predictions.rationale: Easing inflation pressures and growth risks can pull 5y real yields to 1.8% or lower.
